responsibilities: At BRAC IT Services, I play a key role in driving large-scale system implementations and ensuring seamless adoption across diverse user bases. My work includes leading the rollout of the Payroll Leave & Attendance module for over 1 million employees, managing secure data migration with zero data loss, and conducting system load testing for 2,000–10,000+ users to ensure scalability and reliability.

I’ve also enhanced accessibility through Single Sign-On (SSO) integration and established a Post-Go-Live Support Framework that aligns project teams with long-term business objectives. By bridging clients, vendors, and internal teams, I ensure challenges in UAT are quickly resolved and that every project milestone delivers measurable value.

As a consultant, I’ve worked on digital transformation projects like the Hanif Enterprise Digital Challan Management System and the Tiko B2B ERP solution. My role involves aligning technical requirements with business goals, optimizing processes, and streamlining communications between clients, vendors, and internal teams.
Through structured planning and stakeholder coordination, I helped reduce project turnaround times by 20%, while contributing to improved ERP visibility and automation for the transport industry.

At Jatri, I contributed to scaling public transport ticketing solutions that reached 10,000+ active users and facilitated the issuance of 150M+ tickets. I managed multiple projects simultaneously, driving efficiency improvements that cut project timelines by 15% and improved execution success rates by 25%.

I also led a team of 3 SQA engineers for 6 months, where I focused on task delegation, mentoring, and performance evaluations. My work emphasized collaboration, risk mitigation, and ensuring project milestones were consistently met.

In this role, I worked closely with product managers and engineers to shape the development of transportation ticketing systems. By conducting market research, analyzing trends, and participating in agile sprints, I supported B2B service enhancements that increased user engagement by 40%.
I translated business needs into technical requirements, ensuring engineering teams had clear specifications and roadmaps to deliver impactful solutions.

At Amber IT, I provided technical support for network troubleshooting and hardware management, resolving escalated customer issues with a 100% success rate. Additionally, I maintained and managed equipment inventory worth over 5 million BDT, ensuring operational reliability and resource optimization.
